title: The Beauty Trender 3/11: LGBTQ+ Rights, Bob Chapek, Spotify, Tia & Tamara, Grimes, Khloe Kardashian
itunes:title: The Beauty Trender 3/11: LGBTQ+ Rights, Bob Chapek, Spotify, Tia & Tamara, Grimes, Khloe Kardashian
description:
In this edition of The Beauty Trender, Miles and super producer Joelle Monique discuss the full-on assault on LGBTQ+ rights in America, CEO Bob Chapek 'missing the mark', Spotify losing 1.5m subscribers, Twitter's "Tia & Tamara" debate, Grimes dating Chelsea Manning, and the Kardashians getting 'This You'd?'

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
